changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Initial sql table check-in for StateTransitions
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`StateTransition` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_class` VARCHAR(255), `entity_id` BIGINT(20), `state` VARCHAR(255), `startdate` DATETIME, `enddate` DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `idx_statetransition_entity`(`entity_class`, `entity_id`), INDEX `idx_statetransition_enddate`(`enddate`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
